S1.T1.caption: TABLE I: Important notations and their definitions.
S1.T1.table:
Notation     Definition    
     ℳℳ\mathcal{M}     Set of all cells/BSs.    
   𝒦msubscript𝒦𝑚\mathcal{K}_{m}     Set of all devices associated with BS m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M}.    
   𝒟ksubscript𝒟𝑘\mathcal{D}_{k}     Local dataset at device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m}.    
   𝒘msubscript𝒘𝑚\bm{w}_{m}     Model parameter of the learning task in cell m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M}.    
   fm​(𝒘m;𝝃i)subscript𝑓𝑚subscript𝒘𝑚subscript𝝃𝑖f_{m}(\bm{w}_{m};\bm{\xi}_{i})     Sample-wise loss function of the learning task in cell m𝑚m evaluated at model parameter 𝒘msubscript𝒘𝑚\bm{w}_{m} on sample 𝝃isubscript𝝃𝑖\bm{\xi}_{i}.    
   Fm,k​(𝒘m)subscript𝐹𝑚𝑘subscript𝒘𝑚F_{m,k}(\bm{w}_{m})     Local loss function of device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m} evaluated at model parameter 𝒘msubscript𝒘𝑚\bm{w}_{m} on dataset 𝒟ksubscript𝒟𝑘\mathcal{D}_{k}.    
   Fm​(𝒘m)subscript𝐹𝑚subscript𝒘𝑚F_{m}(\bm{w}_{m})     Global loss function evaluated at model parameter 𝒘msubscript𝒘𝑚\bm{w}_{m} for the learning task in cell m𝑚m.    
   T𝑇T     Number of communication rounds.    
   𝒈ksubscript𝒈𝑘\bm{g}_{k}     Local gradient parameter at device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m}.    
   𝒔mdlsuperscriptsubscript𝒔𝑚dl\bm{s}_{m}^{\rm dl} / 𝒔kulsuperscriptsubscript𝒔𝑘ul\bm{s}_{k}^{\rm ul}     Normalized model parameter of 𝐰msubscript𝐰𝑚\bm{w}_{m} / gradient parameter 𝐠ksubscript𝐠𝑘\bm{g}_{k}.    
   hkdlsuperscriptsubscriptℎ𝑘dlh_{k}^{\rm dl} / hkulsuperscriptsubscriptℎ𝑘ulh_{k}^{\rm ul}     Downlink / Uplink channel coefficient between device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m} and its home BS m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M}.    
   hl,kdlsuperscriptsubscriptℎ𝑙𝑘dlh_{l,k}^{\rm dl} / hk,lulsuperscriptsubscriptℎ𝑘𝑙ulh_{k,l}^{\rm ul}     Downlink / Uplink channel coefficient between device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m} and its non-associated BS l∈ℳ∖{m}𝑙ℳ𝑚l\in\mathcal{M}\setminus\{m\}.    
   yk,ddlsuperscriptsubscript𝑦𝑘𝑑dly_{k,d}^{\rm dl} / ym,dulsuperscriptsubscript𝑦𝑚𝑑uly_{m,d}^{\rm ul}     Downlink / Uplink signal of the d𝑑d-th dimension received at device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m} / BS m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M}.    
   pmdlsuperscriptsubscript𝑝𝑚dlp_{m}^{\rm dl} / pkulsuperscriptsubscript𝑝𝑘ulp_{k}^{\rm ul}     Downlink / Uplink transmit power at BS m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M} / device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m}.    
   zk,ddlsuperscriptsubscript𝑧𝑘𝑑dlz_{k,d}^{\rm dl} / zm,dulsuperscriptsubscript𝑧𝑚𝑑ulz_{m,d}^{\rm ul}     Additive receiver noise of the d𝑑d-th dimension at device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m} / BS m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M}.    
   𝒓kdlsuperscriptsubscript𝒓𝑘dl\bm{r}_{k}^{\rm dl} / 𝒓mulsuperscriptsubscript𝒓𝑚ul\bm{r}_{m}^{\rm ul}     De-normalized signal at device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m} / BS m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M}.    
   𝒆kdlsuperscriptsubscript𝒆𝑘dl\bm{e}_{k}^{\rm dl} / 𝒆mulsuperscriptsubscript𝒆𝑚ul\bm{e}_{m}^{\rm ul}     Downlink dissemination / Uplink aggregation error at device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m} / BS m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M}.    
   𝒘^ksubscript^𝒘𝑘\widehat{\bm{w}}_{k}     Model parameter received at device k∈𝒦m𝑘subscript𝒦𝑚k\in\mathcal{K}_{m}.    
   𝒈^msubscript^𝒈𝑚\widehat{\bm{g}}_{m}     Average of the local gradients received at BS m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M}.    
   cmsubscript𝑐𝑚c_{m}     Receive normalizing factor at BS m𝑚m.    
   ηmsubscript𝜂𝑚\eta_{m}     Learning rate of the learning task in cell m∈ℳ𝑚ℳm\in\mathcal{M}.
references:
Notations:
Italic, bold lower-case, and bold upper-case letters denote scalar, column vector, and matrix, respectively.
Operators (⋅)†superscript⋅†(\cdot)^{\dagger}, (⋅)𝖳superscript⋅𝖳(\cdot)^{\sf T}, and diag​(⋅)diag⋅{\rm diag}(\cdot) denote the conjugate, transpose, and diagonal matrix, respectively.
Besides, operator |⋅||\cdot| returns the cardinality of a set or the absolute value of a scalar, and ∥⋅∥\|\cdot\| represents the Euclidean norm, while ℜ⁡{⋅}⋅\Re\{\cdot\} denotes the real part of a complex value.
The important notations used throughout the paper are listed in Table I.
